tasks.label: Start backend server (reload)
args: & { if (Test-Path 'd:/GitHub/DiaLog/backend/venv/Scripts/Activate.ps1') { . 'd:/GitHub/DiaLog/backend/venv/Scripts/Activate.ps1' }; cd d:/GitHub/DiaLog/backend; $env:PYTHONUNBUFFERED='1'; if (Get-Command uvicorn -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { uvicorn main:app --reload --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8000 } else { python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8000 } }
